entry.title: The Power of a Personal Testimony | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 2 Q3 2020

media:group.media:title: The Power of a Personal Testimony | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 2 Q3 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 3, lesson 2 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book was written by Pastor Mark Finley. The topic is "Making Friends for God" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Winsome Witnesses: The Power of a Personal Testimony”. Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
(July 4–July, 10 2020)
Reading: Mark 5:15–20, Mark 16:1–11, Acts 4:1–20, 1 John 1:1–3, Gal. 2:20, Acts 26:1–32.
Memory Text: “ ‘For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard’ ” (Acts 4:20, NKJV).
Sunday (Jill Morikone) “Unlikely Witnesses” Monday (John Lomacang) “Proclaiming the Risen Christ” Tuesday (Ryan Day) “Changed Lives Make a Difference” Wednesday (Jason Bradley) “Sharing Our Experience” Thursday (Kenny Shelton) “The Power of a Personal Testimony”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2020:3Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ320_02.pdf
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL WEBSITE: https://3abnsabbathschoolpanel.com/
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PODCAST: https://3abn.org/SSP-Podcast.html

entry.title: Why Witness? | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 1 Q3 2020

media:group.media:title: Why Witness? | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 1 Q3 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 3, lesson 1 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book was written by Pastor Mark Finley. The topic is "Making Friends for God" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Why Witness?”. Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
(June 27–July, 3 2020)
Reading: James 5:19, 20; Luke 15:6; Zeph. 3:17; John 7:37, 38; 1 Tim. 2:3, 4; 2 Cor. 5:14, 15.
Memory Text: “For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Savior, who desires all men to be saved and to come to the knowledge of the truth” (1 Timothy 2:3, 4, NKJV).
Sunday (John Lomacang) - “Providing Opportunities for Salvation” Monday (Ryan Day) - “Making Jesus Glad” Tuesday (Kenny Shelton) - “Growing by Giving” Wednesday (Danny Shelton) - “Faithfulness to Christ’s Command” Thursday (Jill Morikone) - “Motivated by Love”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2020:3Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ320_01.pdf
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL WEBSITE: https://3abnsabbathschoolpanel.com/

entry.title: Blurred Lines and Dim Minds | Ryan Day (SDA Sermon)

media:group.media:title: Blurred Lines and Dim Minds | Ryan Day (SDA Sermon)
media:group.media:description:
SDA sermon produced by 3ABN with Ryan Day. Why not one of us will ever receive the Seal of God until our character is free from one spot or wrinkle. Is this possible? The Bible shows us how we can be found worthy to live with God in Heaven and to have a right to the tree of life. Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Pastor Ryan Day.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: Living by the Word of God | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 13 Q2 2020

media:group.media:title: Living by the Word of God | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 13 Q2 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 2, lesson 13 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "How To Interpret Scripture" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Living by the Word of God”. Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
(June 20–June 26, 2020)
Reading: Phil. 2:12–16; Luke 4:4, 8, 10–12; Ps. 37:7; Ps. 46:10; Ps. 62:1, 2, 5; Col. 3:16.
Memory Text: “But be doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves” (James 1:22, NKJV).
Sunday (Jill Morikone) - “The Living Word of God and the Holy Spirit” Monday (Ryan Day) - “Learning From Jesus” Tuesday (John Lomacang) - “Jesus Versus Scripture?” Wednesday (John Dinzey) - “Quiet Times With the Word of God” Thursday (Kenny Shelton) - “Memory and Song”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2020:2Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ220_13.pdf
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL WEBSITE: https://3abnsabbathschoolpanel.com/
